name: Cuddle
script: %user% and %users% lay in bed, cuddling gently!
%user% and %users% cuddle in each other's arms!
%user% cuddles %users%, making them a big ball of floof!
%user% gives loving and passionate cuddles to %users%!
%users% gets smothered in floof as %user% cuddles them!
%user% covers %users% in their floof, cuddling them!
